message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great opportunity to purchase this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $200.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can we meet in the middle at $150?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not comfortable meeting you at $150. I'm willing to go a bit lower, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $180?
I'm still really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $160, but that's as high as I can go. Can we meet at $160?
I understand you're willing to go up to $160, Bob, but I'm not sure I can meet you there. How about we compromise at $175?
I'm still really interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $160. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about we do $170?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to consider your latest offer, but I still think I can do better than $170. How about we meet at $185?

I'm starting to think that I'll have to walk away if we can't meet at a price I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $165, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider buying from John for $100
